price: Òun ni Ẹni tó ń sọ àwọn āyah tó yanjú kalẹ̀ fún ẹrúsìn Rẹ̀ nítorí kí ó lè mu yín kúrò nínú àwọn òkùnkùn wá sínú ìmọ́lẹ̀. Dájúdájú Allāhu ni Aláàánú, Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run fún yín.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ لِّيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yunazzilu ʿalā ʿabdihi āyātin bayyinātin liyukh'rijakum mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri wa-inna al-laha bikum laraūfun raḥīmun
translations: that He may bring you out
